messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
My Uncle Javis is slitting his neck and his girlfriend's neck, and I have kids here.
I have kids here. Okay. What's going on there?
My Uncle Javis is slitting his neck in front of my kids.
Okay. What address are you at?
818 East Main.
Is that in Lowell?
Yes.
Okay. All right. Stay on the line with me, and let me get the ambulance on the line. You need to calm down for your children's sake.
Okay.
What's going on, bud? Hello? What's going on?
My Uncle Jeff is slitting his neck in front of my kids and slitting his ex-girlfriend’s neck. Come on! Get in, go!
I can't hear you. Stay on the phone with me.
I am. I am.
Are your kids out of the house?
I can't. It's too cold and I have a newborn.
You can't send them to the neighbors or something?
No, I don't have any friends around here.
Okay. Just a minute. Please hurry.
Yep, they're on the way. Hang on. Let me call.
What's going on now?
He's still trying to slit. He's bleeding badly and he's still trying to slit his ex-girlfriend's neck.
Okay. All right. Hang on just a minute. Where's the knife now?
We're going to be going soon, okay, honey? I promise. We can't. We have nowhere to go. We don't have a car.
Is anybody able to get the knife away from him?
No.
Okay. All right, I don't want anybody else hurt. How many people are hurt at this point?
I'm sure there's two.
What is your first name?
Megan.
Megan, you need to tell me what's going on so I can let my officers know.
Okay. My Uncle Jeff came over here—
Right. Now, tell me what's going on right now.
My Uncle Jeff is standing in front of Jana.
In the living room?
Yes, and Jana is scared. She can't move. Troy can't move.
Is he holding them there so they can't get out? Are they able to get out of the house?
No, they're not able to. None of us can.
Okay. Hold on.
I know you're hungry, but I can't get to your mother.
Who is that?
My niece Mackenzie.
She needs to get away.
I can't put her anywhere. I have no place to put her. That's why I need you guys.
Well, we're on the way, all right, Megan? Just stay with me. What's he doing now?
He's attacking Jana right now.
Okay, all right. Just tell me what's going on, but I don't want anybody else hurt.
He's slitting her. Her neck is bleeding really badly.
He's attacking her again with the knife?
Yes.
Go over there and sit, both of you. Now, get over there, now. I don't want you to see this.
Troy is just sitting there trying to get him to stop.
Is he stabbing her? What's going on?
Either he's playing with his cuts or he's showing his cuts or something. I can't see.
You can't see him right now?
Well, I can see him, but his back's turned, so I don't know what he's doing.
Okay.
No, don't come out here like that. I got kids.
Who are you talking to?
My Uncle Jeff.
Has he still got the knife?
No.
He put it down?
Yes. Wait, he's got a bigger knife!
Oh, Mackenzie. Sit down, Mackenzie.
Hurry up! They're on the way.
Are you able to get the kids out the sliders?
I can see the cops. Please hurry.
Are you able to get the children out to the officer, Megan?
I can't get anybody out. They don't have shoes on. They don't have clothes on.
Are you able to hand them out to the officer?
Hurry up!
What's going on? Megan, what's going on?
He's slitting his neck, killing himself.
He's slitting his own neck?
Yes.
Has any of the officers come in yet?
No, not yet.
Keep me updated as to what's going on, all right?
Get away from there, you guys. Go!
He's laying down?
Yes, he's in the living room.
Okay, who else is in there with him? Dana and Troy are still in there? Are the kids still in the kitchen with you?
Yes. Don't look, you guys. Please don't look.
Okay.
Does anybody approach?
Megan?
What?
I understand this is upsetting, but I need you to keep your...
He's down. You can go.
Are the officers in?
Yes, one of the county sheriffs.
One officer's in?
Yes. Honey, come on, come on.
Are you able to get out?
We're still not, because I don't have any shoes or clothes for the kids.
Are you able to go to a neighbor?
Oh my God, Jana. Oh my God.
Megan?
What?
Let me know what's going on right now.
Is there another officer in there?
I believe so. Are you outside or inside?
We're still inside because I can't get the kids out in this weather.
Okay. Your uncle Jeff is down. Is he?
I don't know if he's dead or what.
Okay. Do they have him handcuffed? Can you see?
Yes, they have Troy and Jana lying on the ground right now.
All right. Are all the officers there with you?
Yes.
Okay. Are you still inside or outside?
We're still inside the house.
All right. Do any of the kids need any medical assistance or are you all set?
We're all set.
Okay. The officers have him handcuffed, right?
He's laying on the ground with his head on the couch. I can't tell if he's dead or not. They can't tell if he's handcuffed.
I just want to make sure the situation is safe before we disconnect.
Okay.
Stay on the line with me a minute. I just want to make sure my officers are safe.
